nodes.text: The Neti were a mythical sentient species that appeared similar to trees. A number of Neti supposedly resided on the forest moon of the planet Ossus. According to the Qel-Droma Epics, T'alla was a Neti Jedi Master who constructed the Gardens of T'alla within the Great Jedi Library on Ossus, subsequently planting herself in the center and transforming into a tree.
